text: Treva Gene "Bookie" Bolin (born June 17, 1940) is a former American football offensive lineman who played professional in the National Football League (NFL) from 1962 through 1969. He played college football at the University of Mississippi where he was part of the 1960 national championship team, and he attended Okolona High School. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:American football offensive linemen Category:Minnesota Vikings players Category:New York Giants players Category:Ole Miss Rebels football players Category:People from Hamilton, Alabama Category:Players of American football from Alabama
title: Bookie Bolin
